biotools.summary: The Standard European Vector Architecture (SEVA) platform is a web-based resource and a material clone repository to assist the choice of optimal plasmid vectors for de-constructing and re-constructing complex prokaryotic phenotypes.

bioschemas.name: SEVA
bioschemas.summary: The Standard European Vector Architecture (SEVA) platform is a web-based resource and a material clone repository to assist the choice of optimal plasmid vectors for de-constructing and re-constructing complex prokaryotic phenotypes.
